cbratt11 I use GOM player, which works perfectly with MKVs, but so does VLC, also.

VLC comes with Matroska (.MKV) support, but some .mkv files may needs additional codecs. Try downloading a codec pack. You can google the ones on the list below. I use K-Lite, so I recommend that.

K-Lite Codec Pack [full]
XP Codec Pack
Cole2k Media Codec Pack Advanced
X Codec Pack
